data.credits:
Art Direction, 3D Imagery : Unexplored Fields
Sound Design : Peran Andre
data.corps: "Lost in a world where everything has ceased to exist. My spirit guides me towards a new horizon. I perpetually float with my rucksack on my back and my horse by my side. I continue the expedition to find the solution. Ready to hit the freezing cold of its nights and to bear the burden of my past. I will keep advancing until I reach my goal, until the light springs from these unexplored fields." Ilsa

data.credits:
Art Direction : Filature Studio
3D Imagery : Unexplored Fields

Art Direction : Nowhere Football Club
3D Imagery : Unexplored Fields
Motion Design : Martin Lemaire
data.corps:
“ We had one million bags of the best Sligo rags
We had two million barrels of stones
We had three million sides of old blind horses' hides
We had four million barrels of bones
We had five million hogs, had six million dogs
Seven million barrels to drink
We had eight million bales of old nanny goats' tails
In the hold of the Irish Rover”

data.credits:
Art Direction : Unexplored Fields and Acid Rays
3D Imagery and Sound Design : Unexplored Fields
Footwear modelling : Nikolas Makridakis
Bag modelling : Martina Ponzoni
data.corps: This video showcases two characters who mimic a match of tennis in an abandonned court.

data.credits: Art Direction, 3D Imagery and Sound Designer : Unexplored Fields
data.corps: Dr. Marten's gave us carte blanche to showcase the new Tarik boots. The content was gobally used across social media and public display at Citadium Haussman, and official stores in Europe.

data.credits: Art Direction, 3D Imagery and Sound Design : Unexplored Fields
data.corps: For the launch of the Dr. Marten's Audrick Boots, we directed and edited a video inspired by cyberpunk aesthetic. The content was gobally used across social media and public display at EP7.

data.credits:
Art Direction, 3D Imagery and Sound Design : Unexplored Fields
Details modelling : Nikolas Makridakis
data.corps: Lacoste asked us to create a short video to showcase their new silhouettes "fashion sport". We decided to put on a motion capture suit to our dancer friend Clément Justin, and let the clothes embody his movements.

data.credits: Art Direction and 3D Imagery : Unexplored Fields
data.corps:
"Before leaving the village to explore the continent on Gröne, his tender Yak, the inhabitants made his portrait. Kids have drawn some memories of his lands on his jacket to bring him luck."

We will follow le Roncier along his voyage through the continent. Here is his portrait. We wanted to create a character that looks brave, curious, but with something childish about it.
